success.yes2yrSeparation: Yes - case started - two year separation
success.yes5yrSeparation: Yes - case started - five year separation
success.yes5yrSeparationTwoDates: Yes - case started - five year separation with two dates
success.yesCaseNotLinkedAndInvalidPin: Yes - case not linked and invalid pin
success.yesCaseNotLinkedAndServerError: Yes - case not linked and server error
success.yesCaseProgressedAwaitingAnswer: Yes - case progressed, defended & awaiting answer
success.corespondentLogin: Set user to Co-respondent to continue journey (+ resp answers doc)
success.corespondentAmendedCaseLogin: Set user to Co-respondent to continue journey - with amended case
success.coRespDefendingWaitingAnswer: Co-respondent user responded - defending waiting answer (has docs)
success.coRespDefendingSubmittedAnswer: Co-respondent user responded - defending submitted answer
